basic.description:
Writing of dramatic exercises and one-act plays accompanied by dramaturgical study of published and original works.
NOTE    Also offered online. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies. Learning Hours may vary.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Playwriting and Dramaturgy I

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     A minimum grade of B- (2.7) in 6.0 units from (DRAM100; DRAM181;BISC100; BISC101) or permission of the Department. 
Corequisite   DRAM 200.
